News.headline: Daggers Hospital Visit 2016
News.short_description: After training on Monday John Still, his team management and the players made their annual visit to both Queen’s and King George’s Hospital’s as they attempted to spread some Christmas cheer
News.description:
The Daggers split up into two groups with one half going to Romford and the other to Goodmayes.

They visited every patient in the Children's ward’s giving them ticket vouchers, programmes and copies of Football Manager 2017 to put into the hospitals raffles.

The players posed for photographs and signed autographs for the youngsters.
